post.description: http://(tfsserver):8080/tfs/DefaultCollection/_apis/test/CodeCoverage?buildId=10 Request: Json of code coverage summary

get.description: Returns attachment references for test run.
Returns attachment references for test result.

completionDate.description: If the operation is complete, the DateTime of completion. If operation is not complete, this is DateTime.MaxValue

creationDate.description: DateTime when the operation was started

message.description: If the operation has Failed, Message contains the reason for failure. Null otherwise.

resultObjectType.description: The type of the object generated as a result of the Clone operation

state.description: Current state of the operation. When State reaches Suceeded or Failed, the operation is complete

url.description: Url for geting the clone information

cloneRequirements.description: If set to true requirements will be cloned

copyAllSuites.description: copy all suites from a source plan

destinationWorkItemType.description: Name of the workitem type of the clone

overrideParameters.description: Key value pairs where the key value is overridden by the value.

relatedLinkComment.description: Comment on the link that will link the new clone  test case to the original Set null for no comment

clonedRequirementsCount.description: Number of Requirments cloned so far.

clonedSharedStepsCount.description: Number of shared steps cloned so far.

clonedTestCasesCount.description: Number of test cases cloned so far

totalRequirementsCount.description: Total number of requirements to be cloned

totalTestCasesCount.description: Total number of test cases to be cloned

buildFlavor.description: Flavor of build for which data is retrieved/published

buildPlatform.description: Platform of build for which data is retrieved/published

coverageStats.description: List of coverage data for the build

build.description: Uri of build for which data is retrieved/published

coverageData.description: List of coverage data and details for the build

deltaBuild.description: Uri of build against which difference in coverage is computed

bag.description: Generic store for test session data

sourceFilter.description: filter for the test case sources (test containers)

name.description: Name of the linked resource (definition name, controller name, etc.)

url.description: Full http link to the resource

childSuiteId.description: Id of child suite in a suite

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence number for the test case or child suite in the suite

testCaseId.description: Id of a test case in a suite

childSuiteId.description: Id of child suite in a suite

sequenceNumber.description: Updated sequence number for the test case or child suite in the suite

testCaseId.description: Id of a test case in a suite

project.description: The team project Id or name.  Ignored if ProjectId is set.

projectId.description: The Team Project ID.  Required if Project is not set.

team.description: The Team Id or name.  Ignored if TeamId is set.

url.description: Url to the full version of the object.

stepIdentifier.description: This is step Id of test case. For shared step, it is step Id of shared step in test case workitem; step Id in shared step. Example: TestCase workitem has two steps: 1) Normal step with Id = 1 2) Shared Step with Id = 2. Inside shared step: a) Normal Step with Id = 1 Value for StepIdentifier for First step: "1" Second step: "2;1"

isDefault.description: Is the configuration a default for the test plans

project.description: Project to which the configuration belongs

values.description: Dictionary of Test Variable, Selected Value

dateCreated.description: Date when the resource is created

stepIdentifier.description: This is step Id of test case. For shared step, it is step Id of shared step in test case workitem; step Id in shared step. Example: TestCase workitem has two steps: 1) Normal step with Id = 1 2) Shared Step with Id = 2. Inside shared step: a) Normal Step with Id = 1 Value for StepIdentifier for First step: "1" Second step: "2;1"

area.description: Area path of the test session

project.description: Project to which the test session belongs

propertyBag.description: Generic store for test session data

associatedWorkItems.description: Workitem references of workitems filed as a part of the current workitem exploration.

endTime.description: Time when exploration of workitem ended.

startTime.description: Time when explore of workitem was started.

areaPath.description: Area path required to create test settings

description.description: Description of the test settings. Used in create test settings.

isPublic.description: Indicates if the tests settings is public or private.Used in create test settings.

machineRoles.description: Xml string of machine roles. Used in create test settings.

project.description: Project to which the test variable belongs

api-Version.name: api-version
api-Version.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '3.2-preview' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.test_write: Grants the ability to read, create, and update test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.
scopes.vso.test: Grants the ability to read test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.

externalDocs.description: Visual Studio Team Services REST APIs
